New Records: Sese Bau became the second Papua New Guinea batter to hit a fifty in the T20 World Cup
Key Match Events: Sese Bau played a fine knock of 50 runs against co-hosts West Indies
Romario Shepherd claimed the wicket of Tony Ura in the second over
Akeal Hosein dismissed number three batsman Lega Siaka with a well-executed arm ball
Alzarri Joseph sent back Papua New Guinea's skipper Assad Vala to the pavilion
Miscellaneous Highlights: West Indies captain Rovman Powell won the toss and chose to bowl vs Papua New Guinea
